name: PolyTrack
description: PolyTrack is a low-poly racing game with loops, jumps and high speeds, where every millisecond counts.

name: Mari0
description: Mari0 is a 2012 side-scrolling platform video game developed by German indie developer Maurice Guégan with creative input from Sašo Smolej and released onto their website Stabyourself.net. It combines gameplay elements from Nintendo's Super Mario series and Valve's Portal series.

name: Discord
description: Discord is an instant messaging and VoIP social platform which allows communication through voice calls, video calls, text messaging, and media and files. Communication can be private or take place in virtual communities called servers.

name: Pixeldust
description: Pixeldust is a lightweight, fast, simple pixel art editor that runs in your browser. It features a simple interface, a color picker, and a variety of tools to help you create pixel art.

name: Instagram
description: Instagram is an American photo and video sharing social networking service owned by Meta Platforms. It allows users to upload media that can be edited with filters, be organized by hashtags, and be associated with a location via geographical tagging. Posts can be shared publicly or with preapproved followers.

name: Twitter
description: Twitter, Inc. was an American social media company based in San Francisco, California. The company operated the social networking service Twitter and previously the Vine short video app and Periscope livestreaming service.

name: YouTube
description: YouTube is an American online video sharing and social media platform owned by Google. Accessible worldwide, it was launched on February 14, 2005, by Steve Chen, Chad Hurley, and Jawed Karim, three former employees of PayPal.

name: Spotify
description: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs.

name: Sandboxels
description: Sandboxels is a free falling-sand simulator that can be played in your browser. It features heat simulation, electricity, density, chemical reactions, cooking, and fire spread. With over 500 unique elements to play with, Sandboxels is a great way to pass the time and relax.

name: Netflix
description: Netflix is an American subscription video on-demand over-the-top streaming service. The service primarily distributes original and acquired films and television shows from various genres, and it is available internationally in multiple languages.

name: Cloud Gaming
description: i spit FLAMES

name: WebRetro
description: Play many retro games on WebRetro, including Mario, Sonic, and more!

name: Among Us
description: Play Among Us on Glacier via now.gg

name: Roblox Player
description: Play Roblox on Glacier via now.gg

name: Browse Roblox
description: View roblox groups, games, avatars, profiles, and more on Roblox.com

name: Kaido Anime
description: An easy, free, anime viewing website!

name: Character.AI
description: Character.AI lets you create and talk to advanced AI - language tutors, text adventure games, life advice, brainstorming and much more.

name: Scratcharchive
description: Scratcharchive is a website that allows you to view old Scratch projects.

name: GeoFS
description: GeoFS is a free, online flight simulator, with global scenery, that runs in your web browser. Whether you are a licensed pilot practicing VFR, an aviation enthusiast or just looking for some fun flying in beautiful landscapes, you can enjoy any of the 20 available aircraft, ranging from para-glider to airliners, absolutely anywhere in the world.

name: Minecraft (forge)
description: Play Minecraft 1.8 SP/MP, including RTX Shaders and Client-side EaglerForge.

name: Minecraft (astra)
description: Play Minecraft 1.8 SP/MP, including Astra.

name: Minecraft (starlike)
description: Play Minecraft 1.8 SP/MP, including Starlike.

name: Minecraft (1.9)
description: Play Minecraft 1.9 SP/MP, including Lambda.

name: Minecraft (1.8)
description: Play Minecraft 1.8 SP/MP, including RTX Shaders.

name: Minecraft (1.5)
description: Play Minecraft 1.5 SP/MP, including RTX Shaders.

name: Minecraft (1.2.6)
description: Play Minecraft 1.2.6 singleplayer.

name: Minecraft (1.3)
description: Play Minecraft Beta 1.3.

name: Minecraft (glacier)
description: Play Minecraft SP/MP, with Glacier's own Glacier Client.

name: Minecraft (resent1.8/beta.html)
description: Play Minecraft SP/MP, with Resent Client.

name: Minecraft (resent1.8)
description: Play Minecraft SP/MP, with Resent Client.

name: Minecraft (shadow4)
description: Play Minecraft SP/MP, with Shadow Client.

name: Minecraft
description: Play Minecraft however you like!

name: Forge Mod List
description: A simple modlist for Minecraft Forge

name: TikTok
description: TikTok, whose mainland Chinese counterpart is Douyin, is a short-form video hosting service owned by ByteDance. It hosts user-submitted videos, which can range in duration from 3 seconds to 10 minutes. Since their launches, TikTok and Douyin have gained global popularity.

name: Google Docs
description: Google Docs is an online word processor included as part of the free, web-based Google Docs Editors suite offered by Google, which also includes Google Sheets, Google Slides, Google Drawings, Google Forms, Google Sites and Google Keep.

name: Google Slides
description: Google Slides is a presentation program included as part of the free, web-based Google Docs suite offered by Google. Google Slides is available as a web application, mobile app for: Android, iOS, and as a desktop application on Google's ChromeOS. The app is compatible with Microsoft PowerPoint file formats.

name: Google Sheets
description: Google Sheets is a spreadsheet application included as part of the free, web-based Google Docs Editors suite offered by Google. Google Sheets is available as a web application; a mobile app for: Android, iOS, and as a desktop application on Google's ChromeOS. The app is compatible with Microsoft Excel file formats.

name: Google Classroom
description: Google Classroom is a free blended learning platform developed by Google for educational institutions that aims to simplify creating, distributing, and grading assignments. The primary purpose of Google Classroom is to streamline the process of sharing files between teachers and students.

name: Creatur.io
description: Creatur.io is a fun and cute multiplayer cat game in which you control an adorable little cat! You must provide your cat with food, help them grow, and fight against the other cats in the arena for domination! Throughout the map, there are a limitless number of gems to collect that give your character XP and help them grow. As you level up you can evolve and learn new abilities such as a lunge or a speed burst.

name: ChatGPT
description: ChatGPT is a chatbot developed by OpenAI and launched on November 30, 2022. Based on a large language model, it enables users to refine and steer a conversation towards a desired length, format, style, level of detail, and language.

name: Bloons TD 5
description: Bloons TD 5 is a tower defense game that was released on December 13, 2011, and as of February 2015, it is available on the App Store, Google Play, Steam, and PlayStation Store. In the game, players build towers made up of monkeys, cannons, glue, and many more to pop bloons before they reach the end of the path.

name: Snow Rider 3D
description: Snow Rider 3D is a fun snowboarding game. Do you have what it takes to be the best snowboarder? Prove your skills and reach the highest score while collecting gifts and coins!

name: Funny Shooter 2
description: Funny Shooter 2 is a fun shooter game. Collect coins, defeat all enemies, and reach the end of the level!

name: Time Shooter 3
description: Time Shooter 3: SWAT is a similar game to Superhot. Save the hostages from redmen!

name: Papas Freezeria
description: Papas Freezeria is an ice cream shop management game. You've just started an easy job at an ice cream shop on a laidback tropical island, but things get hectic when all of Papa Louie's loyal customers arrive on the island for vacation!

name: Papas Pastaria
description: Papas Pastaria is a pasta shop management game. Head to Portallini and start your career as a pasta chef! You're in charge of Papa's Pastaria, where you'll take orders, cook noodles, add sauces and toppings, and toast breads to craft the perfect plate of pasta for your customers!

name: Papas Pizzeria
description: Papas Pizzeria is a pizza shop management game. Help Roy run the pizzeria while Papa Louie is gone! You'll have to take orders, top and bake the pizzas, cut them to order, and present the finished pies to the waiting customers.

name: Papas Cupcakeria
description: Papas Cupcakeria is a cupcake shop management game. Cook a ridiculous amount of delicious cupcakes for all your wacky customers in Papa's Cupcakeria!

name: Papas Burgeria
description: Papas Burgeria is a burger shop management game. In this sequel to the award-winning hit game “Papa's Pizzeria”, you're headed back to the kitchen to run Papa Louie's new burger shop!

name: Papas Sushiria
description: Papas Sushiria is a sushi shop management game. Your day takes a turn for the worse when you break Papa Louie's lucky cat statue. Is this to blame for the restaurant's underwhelming opening day? All we know is that Papa Louie left on a wild-eyed mission and you're now stuck running the restaurant.

name: Papas Pancakeria
description: Papas Pancakeria is a pancake shop management game. Help Prudence and Cooper run Papa's Pancakeria! You'll need to cook and stack pancakes, french toast, and waffles in Papa's latest time-management game.

name: Papas Taco Mia
description: Papas Taco Mia is a taco shop management game. Papa Louie is branching out with a new taco restaurant and he's putting you in charge! Help Mitch and Maggie take orders, cook meats, and build tacos in Papa's Taco Mia!

name: Papas Cheeseria
description: Papas Cheeseria is a grilled cheese shop management game. Craft colossal Grilled Cheese Sandwiches and pile on the Fries in Papa's Cheeseria!

name: Papas Hot Doggeria
description: Papas Hot Doggeria is a hot dog shop management game. It's opening day at Griller Stadium but the season tickets are all sold out! Looks like the only way to watch the games is to work for your old pal Papa Louie.

name: Papas Wingeria
description: Papas Wingeria is a chicken wing shop management game. You're in charge of Papa's Wingeria, where you'll need to take orders, fry up wings and things in the fryers, toss your wings in Papa's award-winning sauces, and arrange them just right with garnishes and sides for your loyal customers.

name: Papas Donuteria
description: Papas Donuteria is a donut shop management game. You just got a job at Papa's Donuteria in the whimsical town of Powder Point. Sure, the great pay and benefits are nice, but you took the job for that coveted Line-Jump Pass.

name: Adarkroom
description: A minimalist text-based adventure game that combines resource management and exploration.

name: Bad Piggies
description: A puzzle game from the creators of Angry Birds where players build contraptions to transport pigs to their goals.

name: Basketball Stars
description: A multiplayer basketball game where you compete in one-on-one matches against players worldwide.

name: Basket Bros
description: An online multiplayer basketball game featuring various modes and customizable characters.

name: Basket Random
description: A fun, random basketball game with simple controls and unpredictable gameplay.

name: Big Tower Tiny Square
description: A challenging platformer where you navigate a tiny square through difficult levels.

name: Binding of Isaac
description: A roguelike dungeon crawler with a dark, twisted theme and randomly generated levels.

name: Bitlife
description: A life simulation game where you make choices and navigate through various life events.

name: Boxing Random
description: A quirky boxing game with random events and unpredictable gameplay.

name: Celeste
description: A critically acclaimed platformer focusing on climbing a mountain and overcoming personal struggles.

name: Celeste 2
description: A sequel to Celeste, continuing the challenging platforming adventure.

name: Crossy Road
description: An endless hopper game where you guide a character across roads and rivers while avoiding obstacles.

name: Cut the Rope
description: A physics-based puzzle game where you cut ropes to feed candy to a cute monster.

name: Doodle Jump
description: An endless jumping game where you guide a character to jump from platform to platform while avoiding obstacles.

name: Doom
description: A classic first-person shooter with fast-paced action and a variety of weapons.

name: Drive Mad
description: A driving game with challenging courses and various obstacles.

name: FNaF 1
description: The first game in the Five Nights at Freddy's series, a horror game where you survive nights in a haunted pizzeria.

name: FNaF 4
description: The fourth installment in the Five Nights at Freddy's series, featuring new terrifying mechanics and a deeper story.

name: Friday Night Funkin'
description: A rhythm game where you battle opponents in rap battles to win over your partner.

name: Jetpack Joyride
description: An endless runner where you control a character with a jetpack and dodge obstacles.

name: Jump King
description: A challenging platformer where you must climb a tower using precise jumps.

name: Kirby
description: A classic platformer featuring Kirby, a cute pink character who can inhale enemies and gain their powers.

name: Meat Boy
description: A fast-paced platformer where you guide Meat Boy through challenging levels filled with obstacles.

name: Monkey Mart
description: A simulation game where you run a monkey-owned convenience store, managing inventory and serving customers.

name: N-Gon
description: A puzzle game involving geometric shapes and strategic placement.

name: Ovo
description: A platformer with challenging levels and precise controls.

name: Portal 2D
description: A 2D platformer inspired by the Portal series, featuring unique puzzle mechanics.

name: Quake
description: A classic first-person shooter known for its fast-paced action and multiplayer modes.

name: Retrobowl
description: A retro-style football game with simple controls and strategic gameplay.

name: Rooftop Snipers
description: A multiplayer shooting game where you fight opponents on rooftops with various weapons.

name: Run 3
description: An endless runner set in space with challenging obstacles and a variety of characters.

name: Slope
description: A 3D endless runner where you guide a ball down a sloping track while avoiding obstacles.

name: SM64
description: A fan-made recreation of the classic Super Mario 64 with enhanced features.

name: Subway Surfers
description: An endless runner where you dodge obstacles and collect coins while surfing through subways.

name: Temple Run 2
description: A sequel to Temple Run with new environments, obstacles, and power-ups.

name: Tetris
description: A classic puzzle game where you arrange falling blocks to complete lines and clear the board.

name: Tsuika Game
description: A unique game with creative mechanics and engaging gameplay.

name: Vex 5
description: A challenging platformer with intricate levels and precise controls.

name: Vex 6
description: The sixth installment in the Vex series, featuring new levels and tougher challenges.

name: Vex 7
description: The latest entry in the Vex series with even more complex platforming challenges.

name: World's Hardest Game
description: A notoriously difficult game with incredibly challenging levels and obstacles.

name: Linuxzoo
description: Linuxzoo is a free service that provides virtual machines for learning Linux and other IT skills. It offers a range of exercises and tutorials to help users develop their knowledge and expertise.

name: Linuxzoo Guide
description: A guide on how to use Linuxzoo

name: ANY.RUN
description: ANY.RUN is an interactive malware analysis service that allows users to run and analyze suspicious files and URLs in a safe environment. It provides detailed reports on the behavior of malware samples and helps users understand the impact of potential threats.

name: ANY.RUN Guide
description: A guide on how to use ANY.RUN

name: Triage
description: Triage is a threat intelligence platform that helps security teams investigate and respond to security incidents. It provides tools for analyzing and correlating security data, identifying threats, and prioritizing response actions.

name: Triage Guide
description: A guide on how to use Triage

name: ReactOS (no wifi)
description: A free operating system similar to Windows 7 that is compatible with many Windows applications and drivers.

name: DSLinux (wifi)
description: A lightweight Linux distribution designed for older hardware and low-resource systems.

name: VS Code
description: Visual Studio Code is a free source-code editor made by Microsoft for Windows, Linux and macOS. Features include support for debugging, syntax highlighting, intelligent code completion, snippets, and code refactoring.

name: VS Code (Insiders)
description: Visual Studio Code Insiders is a preview version of Visual Studio Code that provides early access to new features and improvements.

name: Syntaxpad
description: Syntaxpad is Glacier's custom code editor based on Monaco. It provides a simple and intuitive interface for writing and editing code in various programming languages.

name: Bootpad
description: Bootpad is Glacier's code interpreter that allows users to run and test code in various programming languages directly in the browser.

name: Quadpad
description: Quadpad is Glacier's web development tool that provides a split-screen interface for writing and previewing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code in real-time.

name: Libera Chat
description: Libera Chat is an IRC network that provides a platform for open-source and free software projects to communicate and collaborate.

name: Slack
description: Slack is a collaboration hub that connects teams and streamlines work by bringing together conversations, files, and tools in one place.

name: Zoom
description: Zoom is a video conferencing platform that allows users to host and join virtual meetings, webinars, and online events.

name: Google Meet
description: Google Meet is a video conferencing platform that enables users to host and join virtual meetings, webinars, and online events.

name: Microsoft Teams
description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that combines chat, video conferencing, file storage, and app integration.

name: Uflix
description: UFlix is a streaming platform that offers a wide range of movies and TV shows for users to watch online.
